name: Deathly Trade
description:
Following your death you have been made an offer to free yourself from the endless pits. You just need to get enough souls to appease the Great Evils that lurk below. 

Careful you don't spend away the last remnant that you own!

Created for Ludum Dare 44 with the theme of "Life is Currency".  You will be facing hordes of enemies to upgrade your abilities, while also making sure you are left with enough souls to survive until you can make your next purchase.

Controls
  • WASD to Move
  • Mouse to Look
  • Left Mouse Button to Attack
  • Escape to Pause Game and Access Shop
  • 1 to use Blink
  • 2 to use Petrify
  • 3 to use Armageddon

Some Controls are only available once specified skill is purchased.
